title: FT/FS: T206 Barney Pelty Horizontal and Rube Waddell throwing

posts.post_title: FT/FS: T206 Barney Pelty Horizontal and Rube Waddell throwing
posts.post_content:
Asking $ for my Pelty Horizontal. Probably one of my favorites in the set. 

Asking $SOLD for Waddell Throwing.

Cards are listed on eBay too.

Listening to trade offers too if you have an EPDG I need.

PayPal friends and family, shipping included.
